sources.title: The Battle of China (1944)
sources.description: The sixth film of Frank Capra's Why We Fight propaganda film series illustrates Japan's occupation of China, including Madame Chiang Kai-Shek's stirring address before congress, the rape of Nanking, the great 2,000 mile migration, and Claire Chennault's Flying Tigers. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-battle-of-china-1944/
